Scottsdale.Hermosa Inn:
The Hermosa Inn is a small boutique hotel located in the affluent Phoenix suburb of Paradise Valley near 32nd Street and Camelback Road. Though not as well known as some of the larger resort hotels in Phoenix, the Hermosa Inn is highly regarded by many established travel companies, including AAA, Condé Nast Johansens, and Fodor's.
The Hermosa Inn is a member of Historic Hotels of America, the official program of the National Trust for Historic Preservation.
